original_text: And he took and sent messes unto them from before him: but Benjamin's mess was five times so much as any of their's. And they drank, and were merry with him.
korean_text: 요셉이 자기 음식을 그들에게 주되 베냐민에게는 다른 사람보다 다섯 배나 주매 그들이 마시며 요셉과 함께 즐거워하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he took and sent messes unto them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 위해 음식을 가져와 보내고

sentences.original_text: but Benjamin's mess was five times so much
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 베냐민의 몫은 다섯 배나 많았으며
